text:
Employees Provident Fund Organisation will conduct a ‘Nidhi Aapke Nikhat’ camp on March 10.

Subscribers can attend the camp between 10 a.m. and 1 p.m. while employers and exempted establishments can attend it between noon and 1 p.m. The camp will be held at EPFO’s regional office on Rajaji Salai in West Tambaram.

For details, contact Ph: 22261141 and 22264376.
title: PF camp on March 10
